flavor_text: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokemon they embrace it and bring it to shore.
It gently holds injured and weak Pokemon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
